name: 8 Trigrams Air Palm
effect:

name: A Tail

Permanent (4)

Leaf | Ninja Dog | Animal

Permanent (2)

Sand | Jonin | Male

Leaf | Male | Genin | Sannin | Clone Status | Squad | Mastery

Valid: When this Ninja is sent out to Attack, you can move 1 Jutsu or Mission card from your Discard Pile or Chakra area to your hand.

name: Naruto Uzumaki & Sai
effect:
Leaf | Male | Genin | The Foundation | Anbu | Clone Status | Mental Power: 2 | Platoon

Valid: When you win any Battle Rewards due to this Ninja's Team due to the Showdown, place 1 Growth coin on this Ninja.
Valid: When this Ninja's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, remove 1 Growth coin from this Ninja.

effect:
Leaf | Ogre | Male | Female | Genin | Priestess | Clone Status | Mental Power: 2 | Squad
[PROPHECY OF DOOM]
Valid: When this Ninja card is put in play, designate a number.
Valid: When your opponent puts a Ninja card with an Entrance cost with the designated number in play, remove that card from game instead.

effect:
Leaf | Male | Genin | Anbu | Mental Power: 2 | Clone Status | Platoon
[COOLNESS AND ENTHUSIASM]
Valid: Your Ninjas, including this Ninja, cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's Ninjas.
Valid: Your other injured Ninjas get +1/+1.
Valid: This Ninja can become the user of Jutsu cards with Requirements: "The First Hokage".

name: Necklace of the First Hokage
effect:
Permanent
Target: (1) 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
             (2) Your in-play "Yamato" or "The                    First Hokage"

effect:
Leaf | Male | Byakugan | Growth | Name: Neji Hyuga

name: Not Again
effect:
Permanent

name: Not Another Step
effect:
Counter Permanent (3)

name: Orochimaru
effect:
Sound | Sannin | Male | Mental Power: 3 | Mastery
[FORBIDDEN JUTSU]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can search for 1 Ninja card with both 5 Entrance cost and a Water Symbol in your Deck and move it to your Discard Pile. Then, shuffle your Deck.
During your Mission Phase, if you don't hace a Ninja with both 5 Entrance cost and a Water Symbol in play, you can remove from game 2 of your Chakras. In that case, put 1 Ninja card with both 5 Entrance cost and a Water Symbol in play from your Discard Pile.
"Is that all you got?"

name: Orochimaru
effect:
Sound | Sannin | Male | Ambush | Mental Power: 3
